name: Slide Out Menu
description:
Slide out menu item and section order is determined predominantly by Extras config.
ex: https://atbatappconfig.mlb.com/android/6.6.0/lite-phone/extras.xml

The following items may or may not appear even if they are set up in the config depending on user's entitlement status or device API Level.

Buy At Bat button - Only for LITE users
Ballpark button - Can be configured depending on user's market (Google vs. Amazon)

[H] - Handset Only
[T] - Tablet Only

Top Level section - Contains hamburger button, no 'Up' button, slide out menu should be accessible 
Bottom level section - Contains 'Up' button, no hamburger button, slide out menu should not be accessible
